product_name: Maxiglide Maxx Waxx with Applicator - 4 oz.
long_description: Use Maxiglide Maxx Waxx with applicator to keep your skis gliding along smoothly without having to take the time to iron in wax. Jojoba-based universal wax can be used on waxless cross-country skis, alpine skis and snowboards. Simply rub the wax into the bases of your skis with the included applicator.
short_description: Use Maxiglide Maxx Waxx with applicator to keep your skis gliding along smoothly without having to take the time to iron in wax.
